phrases.phrase: 나물 먹고 물 마시고 팔을 베고 눕다
meanings: lead a simple and leisurely life
commit suicide by taking potassium cyanide
식사 중의 표현 I want to drink some tea.

vlive.korean: 마시고. Let me take a sip too. 듣기 View video DIA : [DIA] 책 읽어주는 채연이♡
vlive.english: Let me take a sip too.

vlive.korean: 큐 형 방에서 마시고 있는데 왜 그러냐! And that I was drinking it in Q's room. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [THE BOYZ] 영재 전용 유기농주스 만들려고 농장차렸어🍅🥤 (ERIC talking about tomato juice episode)
vlive.english: And that I was drinking it in Q's room.

vlive.korean: 그래서 비 오는데 비 맞지 마시고 꼭... It's raining today and please don't get wet. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 범규의 ASMR
vlive.english: It's raining today and please don't get wet.

vlive.korean: 계속 마시고 있었는데 - 바닐라라떼 마시고 나서부터지? I just kept drinking. - Was it after you tried vanilla latte? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
vlive.english: I just kept drinking. - Was it after you tried vanilla latte?

vlive.korean: "뭐 마시고 있어요?" "What are you drinking"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 헐 모아 여러분🤭

examples.korean: He took a mouthful of water and swirled it around his mouth. 발음듣기 그는 물을 한 모금 마시고 그걸 입 안에서 빙빙 돌렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He took a mouthful of water and swirled it around his mouth. 발음

examples.korean: I could murder a beer. 발음듣기 맥주 한 잔 마시고 싶어 죽겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I could murder a beer. 발음

examples.korean: They got drunk on vodka. 발음듣기 그들은 보드카를 마시고 취했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They got drunk on vodka. 발음

examples.korean: He was slurping his tea. 발음듣기 그는 후루룩 소리를 내며 차를 마시고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was slurping his tea. 발음

examples.korean: She was sitting at the bar. 발음듣기 그녀는 카운터에 앉아 (술을 마시고) 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was sitting at the bar. 발음
